io.sentry

Interface Integration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityBreadcrumbsIntegration, AnrIntegration, AppComponentsBreadcrumbsIntegration, AppLifecycleIntegration, EnvelopeFileObserverIntegration, NdkIntegration, PhoneStateBreadcrumbsIntegration, SendCachedEnvelopeFireAndForgetIntegration, ShutdownHookIntegration, SystemEventsBreadcrumbsIntegration, TempSensorBreadcrumbsIntegration, UncaughtExceptionHandlerIntegration

    public interface Integration
    Code that provides middlewares, bindings or hooks into certain frameworks or environments, along with code that inserts those bindings and activates them.
